page.title: 08M.50 Motorway
page.content: Mrs Jones has worked here since 1955 and the motorway was started 4.5 years after in 1959 and was finished in 1976 17 years later.Mrs Jones and another teacher went to see the cavalcade.They walked down the motorway and it is now called the M50.The motorway is around 50 to 60 meters away.We can hear cars and lorries all day mostly.Some days its not so loud. The other side of the motorway is a house.People used to go to the house down a lane, next to the school. Now they have to go over a bridge, and up a road, and down a passway.To get on the motorway you need to go to Tewkesbury or Ledbury as that is where the nearest junctions are situated.
